Package project.bomb.vacuum

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BombVacuumController
    public interface Controller
    Handles the communications between a View and Model

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        void startNewGame​(DefaultBoard board)
        Starts a new game using a default configuration.
        Parameters:
        board - the default board type to use.

      • setView

        void setView​(View view)

      • startNewGame

        void startNewGame​(BoardConfiguration boardConfiguration)
        Starts a new game with the specified rows, columns, and bombs.

        A game must have a minimum of two rows and two columns, and between 1 bomb and (rows * columns) - 1 bombs.

        Parameters:
        boardConfiguration - the configuration to use.

      • tileUpdatedByUser

        void tileUpdatedByUser​(TileAction tileAction,
                       Position position)
        Called when a tile has been altered by the user.
        Parameters:
        tileAction - which mouse button was pressed.
        position - which tile position was pressed.

      • getScores

        HighScores getScores()
        Gets the high scores for the current board.
        Returns:
        the high scores for the board.

      • getScores

        HighScores getScores​(DefaultBoard board)
        Gets the high scores for the specified type of default board.
        Returns:
        the high scores for the specified board.

      • cheatToggled

        void cheatToggled​(boolean cheat)
        Parameters:
        cheat - true to show all bombs, false to hide bombs.

      • startTimer

        void startTimer()
        Starts the timer.

      • updateHighScore

        void updateHighScore​(java.lang.String name)
        Updates the high scores for a board.

        SHOULD only be called if the user was playing on a default board configuration.

        SHOULD throw an InvalidStateException if this is called when using a non-default board configuration.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player.

      • initializeBoard

        void initializeBoard​(int rows,
                     int columns)
        Notifies the Controller what the board size is.

        MUST be called before the start of a game.

        Parameters:
        rows - how many rows in the tile grid.
        columns - how many columns in the tile grid.

      • setTileStatuses

        void setTileStatuses​(TileStatus[] statuses)
        Notifies the Controller of tiles that have (maybe) changed.
        Parameters:
        statuses - the status of tiles that have been updated.

      • gameOver

        void gameOver​(GameOverState gameOverState)
        Signals that the game has ended.
        Parameters:
        gameOverState - if the game is a win or loss.

      • setTime

        void setTime​(long time)
        Sets the time displayed.
        Parameters:
        time - the time to display.
